mapper.update: update `iplog` set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginInfoId = #{logininfoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, loginTime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, ip, state, username, loginInfoId, userType, loginTime from `iplog`
